description: This film shows a Britsol school six weeks after the beginning of term. An experienced teacher, new to the school, is shown introducing practical science and mathematics along lines recommended by Science 5/13: a project jointly sponsored by the Schools Council and the Nuffield Foundation. Suitable for Tertiary level students.
